PickUp.QuestName: In the House of the Red Crane

CustomBehavior.Text:
Need human interaction for next fight, it's hard for an bot
 TIP: 1)Move away when boss spins and from white circle on floor
 TIP: 2)Kill adds only when have low health
 TIP: 3)Kill Boss
 Now choose:
 Want skip fight and loose the achievment? Press continue and goto Upstairs
 Want try kill boss? Press continue and goto Downstairs
 (You can always stop/start bot and goto Upstairs for skip option)
You selected Skip boss/quest, you can always pick quest again later and try it at level 90\n Bot will remove quest from log and continue!!!
You selected Skip boss/quest.\n You can always pick quest again later and try it at level 90\n Bot will remove quest from questlog and continue!!!

You selected Kill the boss.
 Good Luck. May The Light Be With You
 You can always pick quest again later and try it at level 90
 You can always stop/start bot and goto Upstairs for skip option!!!

TurnIn.QuestName: In the House of the Red Crane
